archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.3: The information classification scheme should require that information is protected in line with its assigned level of classification (e.g. confidential, internal or public), regardless of where it is stored (e.g. internal servers, cloud environments or with external suppliers).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
